original_title: Fates Warning: Live at the Dynamo
overview: This DVD is a live performance filmed at the Dynamo Open A ir Festival, March 30th, 1998 during Fates Warning's most r ecent tour of Europe. It includes their most recent studio release, A Pleasant Shade of Gray in its entirety  01.A Pleasant Shade Of Gray  02.Part II  03.Part III  04.Part V  05.Part VI  06.Part VII  07.The Eleventh Hour  08.Point of View  09.Monument  10.We Only Say Goodbye
title: Fates Warning: Live at the Dynamo
